title: Mid Level Software Developer
text:
We have an amazing opportunity for a Mid Level Software Developer in Cape Town.

We require a candidate with:

Ideally a B.Sc. Computer Science or a Diploma in Computer Science / Programming.

MCSD with C# and Object Oriented Programming

Minimum of at least 5 years’ experience

Advanced C# .NET skills;

Entity Framework

ASP.Net (Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript)

Report tools (Microsoft, SSRS)

MVVM, MVC

Ability to read Visual Basic code

TFS

Advanced MS SQL design and development experience

Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to it.careers@goldmantech.co.za. You can also contact Carmen on XXX-XXXX or alternatively you can visit our website www.goldmantech.co.za

Should you not hear from us within 3 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.
description: Mid Level Software Developer, Cape Town, R3 333.00 - R5 417.00 Per Month (Negotiable) - We have an amazing opportunity for a Mid Level Software Developer in Cape Town.
